alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 4:50AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River near Abbeville affecting Dodge, Wilcox and Telfair Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Abbeville...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River near Abbeville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.9 feet, Flooding of farm lands...timberlands...and access roads continue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:45 AM EDT Wednesday was 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 12.7 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.8 feet on 01/27/1963. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
